professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in Linux administration, database management, and DevOps practices. Proven track record in building and deploying scalable applications using modern tools and technologies.

key_responsibilities: Developed and maintained high-performance web applications using Java
Implemented database management strategies to ensure optimal performance and data integrity.
Collaborated with DevOps teams to automate deployment processes and improve CI/CD pipelines.
Administered Oracle and SQL databases to support business operations.
Performed regular backups and recovery processes to ensure data availability.
Monitored and optimized database performance to meet application needs.
Installed and configured Linux systems to support application deployment.
Managed system maintenance and patching to ensure uptime and security.
Coordinated with development teams to streamline build processes.
